entries.meaning: A change to the brand name, logo, or image of a product or company.
examples: Management decided it was time for a complete rebrand.

verbs.description: rebrand (third-person singular simple present rebrands, present participle rebranding, simple past and past participle rebranded)

entries.meaning: (originally marketing) To change the brand name, logo, or image of a product or company.
examples: Acme Co. is trying to rebrand their line of toasters under the Bewidget name.
